alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 12:16PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tulare and central Fresno Counties through 100 PM PDT... At 1215 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Parlier, or 16 miles southeast of Clovis, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fresno, Sanger, Reedley, Selma, Parlier, Del Rey, Calwa, Easton and Fowler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley
